reviews.review: Der Grund warum ich Jungfrau bin
We need to be able to choose servers in competitive matches.

El tarkov esta mejor pero bien
Игра буквально стала классикой и есть за что.... но к сожилению, Valv убивают этот шедевр
The game is really good it just really needs a better anti cheat and needs to fix its trust factor system

The game is really good in terms of weapon choice, maps and competition but due to not having region-specific servers, I often find my self lagging because i am (for example) from eastern Russia and all my team are (again for example) western France, which bring lots of lag with it, i wish the game would have some region-specific for : NA, SA, Europe, Asia, Middle East) i am aware that that may be expensive but i trust that Valve and Hidden Path Entertainment are capable of countering this problem, other than that, I am happy that i played the game, it is worth playing, and with the appealing price tag of Free, why would anyone not want to play the game, it has everything from content for content creators to simplicity and casual gaming for the average Joe, and I strongly recommend this game, thanks for reading.
